title: Fundamentals of Italian III
description: A course to increase the proficiency level of students who have completed LIIT 1B/1BX, 5BS or who are at an equivalent level. Attention to listening comprehension, conversation, reading, writing, grammar analysis, and culture. Equivalent to LIIT 1C/1CX. Prerequisites: LIIT 1B/1BX, 5BS or consent of instructor.
